Every karma challenge that has come along even if I don‚Äôt try I usually can get a bronze of silver when I try sure I can get a gold  but getting emerald is impossible there was a challenge over night midnight-6am I started it right at midnight and played until 2:30am getting ahead of everyone else by 15000 points I even purchased mystery seeds and pot bucks to help give me an extra boost because I wanted to finally win Emerald. Well set my alarm for 5am and I‚Äôm still atleast 10000 point ahead and I keep playing to make sure I stay ahead. For the last hour. In the last 20 minutes someone someone went from 10000 points behind me to being 1000 over me so I go into overdrive trying to beat them in the end nothing I got 2nd place. I even spent my own money and it‚Äôs not that Easy to get 10000 points took me about 2 hours to get that but took someone else 20 minutes. It‚Äôs rigged they want you to spend your money thinking you will win but you won‚Äôt.
